summary: New project with a planned custom domain setup for growithtutor.com.

existing_features.title: Configure the React app to use the public domain "growithtutor.com" for public-domain-based URL generation (PUBLIC_DOMAIN / getPublicUrl / getPublicAssetUrl), ensuring production builds resolve to growithtutor.com rather than a different environment-provided value.
Ensure the standalone landing page domain configuration uses "growithtutor.com" consistently (the standalone public domain constant must be set to growithtutor.com).
